import './index.css' import {Component} from 'react' import {v4 as uuidv4} from 'uuid' import MoneyDetails from '../MoneyDetails' import TransactionItem from '../TransactionItem' const transactionTypeOptions = [ { optionId: 'INCOME', displayText: 'Income', }, { optionId: 'EXPENSES', displayText: 'Expenses', }, ] // Money Manager Main class MoneyManager extends Component { state = { title: '', amount: '', transType: 'Income', transDetail: { balance: 0, income: 0, expense: 0, }, historyList: [], } updateTitle = event => this.setState({title: event.target.value}) updateAmount = event => this.setState({amount: event.target.value}) updateTransType = event => this.setState({transType: event.target.value}) addTransaction = () => { const {title, amount, transType, transDetail} = this.state const {balance, income, expense} = transDetail let updatedBalance let updatedIncome let updatedExpense if (transType === 'Income') { updatedBalance = balance + parseInt(amount) updatedIncome = income + parseInt(amount) updatedExpense = expense } else { updatedBalance = balance - parseInt(amount) updatedExpense = expense + parseInt(amount) updatedIncome = income } const newTransactionObj = { id: uuidv4(), title, amount, transType, } this.setState(prevState => { const {historyList} = prevState const updatedHistoryList = [...historyList, newTransactionObj] return { title: '', amount: '', transType: 'Income', transDetail: { balance: updatedBalance, income: updatedIncome, expense: updatedExpense, }, historyList: updatedHistoryList, } }) } deleteHistory = historyId => { const {historyList} = this.state const updatedHistoryList = historyList.filter( eachObj => eachObj.id !== historyId, ) this.setState({historyList: updatedHistoryList}) } render() { const {title, amount, transType, historyList, transDetail} = this.state return (

Hi, Richard

Welcome back to your Money Manager

) } } export default MoneyManager
